My 11 yr old niece started 6th grade this year. 

New school. Back in person post covid.

1st day school she joined:

- spirit club

- volleyball team

Talked to her on phone. She hasn't sounded this happy in 2 yrs.

Isolation is not good for kids!

content:
NEW: Queensland has recorded two new locally-acquired cases of COVID-19.

Both are students linked to the Sunnybank cluster and have been in home isolation.

Two were recorded in hotel quarantine.

1000 families are still in home quarantine.

content:
Dear Iowa Public Community School Districts,

Isolation is the term for COVID+ students and staff. Quarantine is the term for those exposed and not currently positive. Please don’t use one when you mean the other. 

Sincerely,
IAC Tracker
renderedContent:
Dear Iowa Public Community School Districts,

My school is preemptively quarantining a whole class for just one mild symptom.  Only if/when the kid tests neg, can they all return.
